alert.note: Alert for Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 30 at 10:11PM CDT until April 30 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LEE AND CENTRAL TUNICA COUNTIES... At 1010 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Brickeys, or 13 miles south of Hughes, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tunica, North Tunica, Dubbs, Little Texas, Maud, Fox Island, Commerce, Austin, Clayton, Hollywood, Diamond Woods, Whitehall, Evansville and Bowdre. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
